title: Interpretation of In the Name of God Almighty in a dream

preview.html: In this article, we will learn about its importance in detail through our website gptafser.com/, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing “In the Name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful” in a dream for a single girl. Seeing “In the Name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful” in an unmarried girl’s dream may indicate that a young man named Abdul Rahman is offering to marry her. Perhaps it indicates However, a young man proposes to her who carries characteristics of the name, such as tenderness of heart, compassion, and tenderness, and that God Almighty is high. If the girl is in a quarrel with someone and sees the name Elemon in a dream, it indicates the dreamer’s withdrawal from the quarrel and her initiative to reconcile with this person, and God knows best. Either That the girl was suffering from problems related to her marriage or disapproval from her family, and she saw the name Al-Rahman in the dream. The vision indicates the facilitation of her affairs and the approval of her family. If a young man who proposes to the dreamer is named Abdul Rahman, and he hesitates in making the decision to accept or reject him, and she sees the name Al-Rahman in her dream, This is a sign from God on her. He agrees. Seeing the name Al-Rahman in a girl’s dream symbolizes her good morals and the purity and tenderness of her heart, which distinguishes her from other girls. Seeing the name Al-Nabeel may occur repeatedly in a girl’s dream, due to her excessive thinking about her distant future, and God knows best. If the girl sees that she is calling on God in the name of the Most Merciful She is crying and looking at the sky. The dream indicates that she will be in distress, but she will pray to God to remove this sadness from her. See also: Seeing the righteous guardian of God in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of the appearance of In the Name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful in a dream for a married woman. Seeing the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful in A woman’s dream indicates that she has a good husband who loves her and tries to make her happy in various ways. Seeing the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful in a married woman’s dream may be a sign that she will become pregnant soon, and God Almighty knows best. If she dreams of the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful, this shows that the dreamer has the quality of mercy and has It indicates the integrity of her religion. This may indicate her joining charitable and volunteer work and her love of helping others without expecting anything in return. Seeing In the Name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful in the home indicates good solutions and blessings in the life of the dreamer, her husband, and her children. Or if the woman sees that she is pronouncing In the Name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful. Al-Rahim and she has children. This is a sign that they will occupy a high position in the future, God willing. If the dreamer has some disagreements with her husband or her family and sees “In the Name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.” It indicates the end of problems, God willing. Seeing chanting “In the Name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful” in a dream may indicate To the woman. To remind her to thank God for what he has given her so that he does not disappear from her life, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the name Ar-Rahman in her dream and her husband or son’s name is Abd al-Rahman. It shows the intensity of her love and attachment to this person. But if her husband is traveling and sees the name Ar-Rahman, This is good news of his safe return in the coming days, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful in a dream for a person and its meaning. If one sees the name Merciful in a dream, this means that he will obtain money and profits through his current job. Seeing the name of God, Most Gracious, Most Merciful in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing red bricks in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing red bricks: Seeing red bricks in a dream is one of the visions that many people have. It can be one of the good visions that brings goodness to God, and it can be one of the unpleasant visions that bring evil. Among the interpretations of this vision: The interpretation of seeing red bricks in a dream indicates the dreamer’s success and gaining a lot of money. If one sees red bricks in a dream...this indicates the presence of problems and judgments. He is suffering during this time, but they will be resolved quickly. If one sees that he is building a house With red bricks... this indicates the abundance of goodness and livelihood that will come to him in the near future. Seeing red bricks in a dream may indicate achieving the goals that the dreamer desires to achieve. Red bricks in a dream may indicate good qualities that the dreamer has, such as kindness and goodness. , and that is why people love it. Red bricks in a dream also indicate that the dreamer speaks badly about people. If one sees red bricks in a dream, this indicates one’s wisdom in solving problems. The interpretation of seeing red bricks in a dream indicates that the dreamer does not want Changing his opinions or beliefs. Seeing red bricks in a dream can mean that the dreamer is thinking a lot about his future. Red bricks in a dream may indicate obstacles that prevent the dreamer from achieving his dreams. If one sees in a dream that he is building a house with red bricks.. but it is unstable, This indicates that this person feels confused about everything. The interpretation of seeing red bricks in a dream for a single woman. The interpretation of seeing red bricks in a dream for an unmarried girl varies according to the details of the dream, and among these interpretations: The interpretation of seeing red bricks in a dream for a single girl indicates that she will soon marry a good man who will love her and make her happy. Seeing red bricks in a dream may indicate: In the dream of an unmarried girl, she will feel extreme sadness, despair, and loss of hope. If an unmarried woman sees red bricks, this indicates her failure in study, work, or personal life. If a single girl sees herself throwing a red brick at someone This indicates her victory over enemies and getting rid of them. Seeing a single girl throwing red bricks means that there are people speaking ill of her. If an unmarried girl sees that she is building a house with red bricks, this indicates her success at all levels in academic and practical life. Seeing yourself throwing red bricks at enemies in a dream for a single girl indicates the fulfillment of desires and dreams that she wants to fulfill in the near future. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that red bricks are broken, this indicates the difficulties and crises that she will suffer in the near future. Seeing the construction of a house from Bricks in an unmarried girl’s dream...means that she will receive a lot of money from a source during the coming period. Seeing the building of a red brick house for a single girl in a dream may indicate that she will be married off to a religious man in the near future. If an unmarried girl sees herself throwing bricks

title: Interpretation of a dream about stealing wine in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about stealing wine in a dream has many different meanings, and the meanings of dreams vary depending on the vision behind them. We show what it means to interpret a dream about stealing wine in a dream and more...Interpretation of a dream about stealing wine in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about stealing wine may reflect changes for the dreamer, and God knows the unseen, while if a young man sees wine stolen, it may express the changes he is going through. If a married woman sees wine stolen, This may reflect changes in her life, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees the theft of alcohol, this may reflect the changes she faces, and God Almighty is All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol at a wedding party in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about drinking alcohol at a wedding party in a dream. We did not find clear explanations to see that. However, the Seeing yourself drinking alcohol in a dream could be a sign of happiness, God willing. When you see a married woman drinking alcohol in a dream, this could be evidence of goodness and happiness, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl is seen drinking alcohol, it may be a marriage, and God knows best. In the event that the dreamer sees himself drinking alcohol in In a dream, this may be evidence of a new beginning, and God knows best. Seeing a woman giving her husband alcohol and drinking with her could indicate stability and happiness, and God knows the unseen. It could also express good relationships and stability. And God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a married woman, refusing to drink alcohol may indicate purity and chastity, and God knows best. The interpretation of drinking wine and not being drunk in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about drinking wine and not being drunk in a dream could portend righteous people, and God knows the unseen. If a righteous man sees himself drinking wine without getting drunk, then he may This is a sign that he is getting closer to God, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a single girl sees herself drinking wine without sugar, this may be evidence that she is being given by God, and God knows the unseen. However, if the dreamer sees himself drinking unsweetened wine, it may represent committing sins, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of the dream of drinking red wine in a dream. If the dreamer sees himself drinking alcohol in a dream, this may be evidence of distance from God, and God knows the unseen. When you see drinking Wine to which water is added, this may be a sign of healing, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of buying wine for a divorced woman in a dream. Seeing a divorced woman drinking alcohol could represent freedom from worry and sadness, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. title: Interpretation of death in a dream: seeing the death of a single man with a married woman in a pregnant woman

preview.html: Interpretation of death in a dream for a girl, woman, married or single, whether it is the death of a beloved husband, brother, father, mother, or the death of a stranger or anyone I know, when I hear news of death and death and dream that I am dead in the vision of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation Death in a dream by Ibn SirinThe respected scholar Ibn Sirin, one of the ancient dream interpreters who trusted his interpretation of the world of dreams and vision, interpreted death in a dream from different aspects, as he said that death in a dream in general indicates remorse for something shameful. Therefore, if a person sees himself dying and then alive again, this indicates that he will disobey him and repent for him. As for whoever sees himself dead in his sleep without being harmed by the disease and does not see himself in a form, this is evidence that his life will be long. As for whoever sees in a dream that he does not die, this means that his death is near, and it has come. And whoever sees himself as dead and sees the manifestations of his death such as washing And shrouds, funerals, funerals, and graves, these are a sign of the corruption of his religion and his peace in this world. And whoever sees in his dream the death of the Imam, this indicates that his city will sink into corruption and destruction, and vice versa. Whoever sees the ruin of the country, this indicates the death of an imam, king, or president. Without lamentation, this indicates that the dreamer is about to get married. Whoever sees that he died during his sleep, and there are no signs of death in the dream, this indicates that his house will fall, either physically from the fall of its walls, or morally from the corruption of the house. Morals and religion, and in another direction, that the dreamer will be afflicted with poverty, and whoever sees in his dream that there is a dead person in the house somewhere, this indicates that a fire will break out in that place. Because whoever sees that he died naked, meaning without clothing, this indicates poverty. As for whoever sees that he died on a bed or mattress, this indicates that he will achieve status and success in this world. As for whoever sees that he found a person and that this person has died, this indicates that he He found money, and if he hears in a dream the news of the death of someone he does not know, this means that he will hear unpleasant things. Newsletter. Whoever sees in a dream that his son has died, this indicates that he will not have sex with his wife until she dies, and the death of a married man in a dream indicates divorce. Whoever sees that he is separating the bones of the dead, then he is spending his money in a way that does not suit him, and if he sees that he is collecting it, then this Acquisition of money and benefit. Whoever sees that someone treats a dead person will show him compassion. Whoever sees that he comes to a dead pit and finds fire in it, this indicates the ugliness of the dreamer’s uncle and his warning. Perhaps the owner of the pit is committing heresy and deception, in addition to seeing insects in it. Whoever sees that the dead person is in a dark place. Then he rose and rose, and the soul returned to him, so the dreamer obtains glory, wisdom, and legitimate money. And if he sees that he is doing evil, then he forbids evil deeds and abandons them. Abu Saeed Al-Wathi said the basic principle in seeing a dead person is, if he is seen in a dream doing something righteous in which there is justice in his religion and his world, It urges the dreamer to do good. And whoever sees that the dead has come out of the dead, such as urine, feces, pus, blood, spit, phlegm, and the like, then it has two aspects. It was said: All of these were interpreted from the meanings of the above and come in the aftermath, and perhaps it is
preview.text: Interpretation of death in a dream for a girl or a woman or a married or single person, whether it is the death of a beloved husband or brother or father or mother or the death of a stranger or anyone I know, when I hear the news of death and death and I dreamed that I was dead in the vision of Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and others. Interpretation of death in a dream by Ibn Sirin The respected scholar Ibn Sirin, one of the ancient dream interpreters who trusted their interpretation of the world of dreams and visions, interpreted death in a dream from different aspects, as he said that death in a dream in general indicates regret for something shameful. Thus, if one sees himself dying and then alive again, this indicates that he will disobey him and repent. As for the one who saw himself dead in his sleep without being harmed by illness and does not see himself in a picture, this is evidence that his life will be long. As for the one who saw in a dream that he does not die, this means that his death is near, and it has come. And whoever saw himself dead and saw the manifestations of his death from washing, shrouding, funerals, mourning, and graves, this is a sign of the corruption of his religion and peace in this world. And whoever saw in his dream the death of the imam, this indicates that his city will drown in corruption and destruction and vice versa. And whoever saw the devastation of the country, this indicates the death of an imam, king, or president. Without lamentation, this indicates that the dreamer is about to get married. And whoever saw that he died during his sleep, and there are no manifestations of death in the dream, this indicates that his house will fall, either materially from the fall of its walls, or morally from the corruption of the house. Morals and religion, and in another direction, that the dreamer will be afflicted with poverty, and whoever saw in his dream that there is a dead person in the house somewhere, this indicates the outbreak of a fire in that place. Because whoever sees that he died naked, that is, without clothes, this indicates poverty. As for whoever sees that he died on a bed or mattress, this indicates that he will achieve a position and success in this world. As for whoever sees that he found a person and that this person has died, this indicates that he has found money, and if he hears in a dream the news of the death of a person he does not know, this means that he will hear hateful news. Whoever sees in a dream that his son has died, this indicates that he will not have intercourse with his wife until she dies, and the death of a married man in a dream indicates divorce. Whoever sees that he is separating the bones of the dead, he spends his money in a way that does not suit him, and if he sees that he collects it, this is the acquisition of money and benefit. Whoever sees that someone is dealing with a dead person, he has missed him with mercy. Whoever sees that he came to a dead hole and found fire in it, this indicates the ugliness of the dreamer’s uncle and his warning. Perhaps the owner of the hole was committing heresy and deception, as well as seeing insects in it. Whoever sees that the dead person is in a dark place, then he got up and rose, and the soul returned to him, the dreamer obtains glory, wisdom and lawful money. If he sees that he is doing evil, he forbids bad deeds and leaves them. Abu Saeed Al-Wathi said that the origin of the vision of the dead person is that if he is seen in a dream doing something good in which there is justice in his religion and his world, then he urges the dreamer to do good. Whoever sees that the dead person has come out of the dead person such as urine, feces, pus, blood, saliva, phlegm and the like This is on two faces. It was said: All of this was interpreted from the meanings of what came before and comes after, and perhaps it is

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing ticks in a dream?

preview.html: Hadota website offers you the complete interpretation of seeing your zodiac sign in a dream. It is known that ticks are a type of insect belonging to the arachnid family that has eight legs and is found in America and Africa. Ticks feed on the blood of animals, which can be carriers of many diseases. Therefore, seeing ticks in a dream is one of the dreams of many people, and this is why, dear followers, we see ticks in a dream to complete and kill them, as well as the interpretation of seeing insects on the body in a dream. Completely, as we have collected for you what is the interpretation of seeing ticks in a bowl, married women, pregnant women and men through the books of higher sciences in the interpretation of visions and dreams. What is the interpretation of seeing ticks in a complete dream by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing ticks in a dream indicates a weak encounter, but it is harmful. The interpretation of seeing a tick coming out of the mouth in a dream completely indicates the goodness and wonderful life that the dreamer will have. Seeing Kamel killing ticks and defeating them in a dream means that the dreamer will triumph over all his enemies. Seeing a tick in a dream also symbolizes one of the visions that indicates a meeting. With traitors. If you see yourself eating ticks in a dream, this means that you are eating forbidden money through illegal means. Seeing yourself eating ticks in a dream also indicates a disease affecting the dreamer. What is the interpretation of seeing ticks for an ordinary woman? Interpretation of seeing ticks in a dream full of an ordinary woman It is one of the visions that indicate bad luck. Also, seeing a sign in a dream indicates the presence of bad people in her life. Seeing a sign in a dream full of unmarried women is considered an invalid marriage. Seeing a sign in a girl’s dream is considered invalid relationships and failures. I was flirting in a dream Married Woman: The interpretation of seeing ticks in a dream for a married woman indicates betrayal, hatred, and deceit. Seeing ticks in a married woman’s dream indicates envy, hatred, and hostility towards her. Evidence of ticks in a woman’s dream can be an indication of the money and wonderful living that she will have. Mark in A dream of a pregnant woman. The interpretation of seeing a tick in a complete dream for a pregnant woman indicates feeding the child. Seeing a tick in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of an easy and trouble-free birth. Eating a tick in a complete dream for a pregnant woman is one of the unpleasant dreams and an unpleasant interpretation. Seeing a tick in a dream And killing it. Seeing killing a tick in a dream means that the dreamer will overcome all the problems that he suffers from. Killing a tick in a dream indicates freedom from hatred and enemies and victory over them. What is the interpretation of seeing a camel tick? Seeing a camel tick in a dream means that you are living in luxury and walking towards the right paths. Seeing a whole camel in a dream symbolizes strength, solidity and patience. title: Interpretation of honey in a dream: Seeing honey in a dream

preview.html: A dream about honey indicates successful relationships and improving the financial conditions of the pioneer, and other interpretations that we will explain to the single, pregnant, married, divorced, and man, such as consuming honey and buying black gifts or white honey from Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, and others. Interpretation of honey in a dream Seeing honey in a dream shows relationships, shows solving problems, and shows generosity when You see yourself making honey in a dream, it means that you should be calm when dealing with some problems. When you eat honey in a dream, it means that you have problems with your partner and you should allow anyone else who is pressuring you to solve these problems and take responsibility for them. When you dream that you are buying When you see honeycomb in In a dream, it represents the change that you will go through, whether it is in the city, at school, or at work, and they are good changes for everyone. When you see yourself putting honey on bread, this indicates a feeling of satisfaction within you and thanking God for His blessings upon you. When you see honey in hive, it means that you will receive a serious reward and you will reach your goal in the end despite the difficulties. Seeing honey in a dream means that you will gain great wealth. Seeing honey in a dream can be a sign of wealth, love and happiness in family life. When you see the sky raining honey, it indicates kindness. And spreading morals and following the Sunnah of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. Seeing pure honey in a dream means getting rid of depression and tension, feeling relaxed, or giving birth. Never tasting honey in a dream indicates marriage and love. When a single man dreams that he is taking honey from a woman, this indicates his marriage to the woman he loves. It may indicate Honey in a dream also indicates that you should be more honest when communicating with others. As for eating honey, it symbolizes joy and longevity. When you see the kingdom of bees in a dream, it means that wealth and happiness come to you in your next life. Eating honey in a dream can be something Negatively, such as suffering from pain, sadness, and health problems. Interpretation of honey in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Imam Al-Nabulsi sees that honey in a dream means obtaining money, whether it is an inheritance or from effort and work, and if the dreamer is a religious person, then this indicates the sweetness of religion, and the recitation of the Koreans. Acts of justice. As for whoever sees the sky raining honey, this refers to Saladin. Honey in a dream can also indicate a negative meaning, which is anxiety, pain, envy, and protection from the conspiracies of envious people. This happens because flies and ants gather around honey. When you see honey filtered by fire in a dream, this means relief from worry and sadness, such as giving birth to a son of yours, obtaining money, guidance, and after that no deception. title: Interpretation of basil in a dream. The meaning of basil in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a basil plant, either picking or eating the dried green leaves, is for an unmarried girl, and for a pregnant, married, or divorced woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Basil: freedom from worries or good deeds, and basil for a single person has a husband, and for a wife a son, or knowledge that is characterized by it. Ownership is for a boy if it grows In the garden, a woman appears if she is collected in a bundle, and a misfortune appears if she is cut and thrown in the wrong place, or if she has no air. It has been said: Basil is a blessing, as God Almighty says: “The fruit and basil are a garden of bliss.” It generally symbolizes a boy if he is in a planted garden, but if he is in an embrace, it symbolizes a woman, and the interpretation given by scholars to see basil in a dream is as evidence of comfort. From distress and anxiety, good work and honesty in dealing. And promises, and whoever sees in a dream that the basilisk appears to a dead person, this means that this dead person is in heaven living happily, and whoever is single and sees the basilisk in his dream, this indicates that this person will get married, but if a married woman sees a king in her dream, this means that This woman will give birth to a child. Green basil is known as tangerine. If its color and smell are good, it indicates that the child was uprooted from the ground, crying and sadness. Al-Nabulsi explained that he saw basil in a dream. Whoever dreams of planting basil in his garden, this indicates childishness, intimidation, and strength, and the dreamer will meet him in his life. Seeing basil shows a person’s sincerity in his dealings and loyalty. Also, if a person sees a basil plant in his dream, this indicates the person’s close relationship with his life partner and his marriage. However, if a woman saw a basil plant, then she was married, then this indicates that she will have a purer child, with permission. God. Also, if one sees basil in his dream with water and greenery, this indicates the death of worries, joy, and the coming of goodness. But if one sees in his dream that there is a basilica above it, then this person was a ruler or ruler who was removed from his position, and whoever sees in his dream someone selling The basilisk and walking around with it, a sign is that this person has fears. But if one sees in a dream that there is another person pulling the basilisk from his house, this indicates sadness and anxiety. Likewise, whoever dreams of the basil rising from the ground to the sky in a certain place, this indicates The death of one of the righteous or wise men, and whoever dreams of someone throwing basil at others, this indicates that the man is the sadness and anguish he feels. The man will bring it. And whoever sees in a dream that there is basil ascending to the sky from the earth, this indicates the death of a scholar, and if the basil grows in the garden, this indicates a boy, and if they are gathered in it. A handful, indicates a woman, which indicates distress if it does not smell and is out of place. If the wind is cut off in a dream, this is a sign of sadness, worry, and sorrow, and if it is in its place, then it means peace, a wife, or a child. In a dream, a man is content with misfortunes, and is patient with fate and destiny. Interpretation of dreams about Royal YouTube

title: The correct interpretation of seeing a woman I know in a dream for a single and married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a woman I know in a dream for a single and married woman. We often see people in our dreams, whether we know them or not, and we may be indifferent to the strangers who meet us in our dreams, but we stand and bewilder ourselves by seeing a familiar face. Seeing a woman I know in a dream. Interpretations of this vision depend on the appearance of this If the woman is beautiful and elegant, then the dream is good news for its owner to achieve his dreams and move forward in his life. But if the woman is ugly in appearance and not well dressed, then the dream is evidence of the chaos that the dreamer is experiencing in his life and that he is on the verge of a scene that will bring him bad events. A woman with a weak body is evidence of... The fortuneteller is going through very bad circumstances in his life and he may lose his money or suffer from an illness that will take a long time to recover. If an unmarried young man sees in his dream a woman who he knows is beautiful in appearance, this is a sign that he is close to marrying a beautiful and kind girl, and that he will live with her in the future. Love and harmony.If the unmarried girl is visionary and the woman looks elegant, then it is good for the unmarried woman that her desires in life will come true soon. Family and residence for a husband who loves him and who loves her, soon she will get this husband. The interpretation of a dream about seeing a woman I know in a dream about a married woman is evidence of her life with her husband. Seeing a woman I know in a dream by Ibn Sirin, and the scholar Ibn Sirin said in the interpretation of this dream that it varies according to the condition of the dreamer and the condition of that person. The woman he sees. If an unmarried girl sees that there are other women in her dream, she may be jealous of them in reality and would like the blessing to disappear from their hands and come to her. But if the dreamer is married and this woman in the dream is distinguished by elegance and beauty, then this is an indication of her relationship with her husband, which is determined based on Her visions. The beauty of a woman in a dream means the beauty of all of life and the enjoyment of emotional calm and mutual love between spouses. However, if the fortuneteller is single, he will marry this woman if she is the one who turned to him, and a married man benefits greatly from her knowledge, as she can help him solve his problems, or achieve a goal. A certain person he desires.Seeing a woman I know in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing a woman I know in a dream about a single womanIf the woman the girl sees is a friend she knows or loves, the evidence of the vision is that she will have a successful love experience and this friend will have a role in her marriage to the person she wants to communicate with However, if she sees a woman she does not love, this is evidence of the many problems she faces and may mean her failure in a romantic relationship and her exposure to a serious psychological crisis. If a girl sees a woman with dark skin in her dream, she may be subjected to distortion in her life by some people, and as a result her marriage will be delayed for a long time. A girl who sees a woman smiling at her and looking beautiful in appearance means that she will marry a man with prestige and power, with whom she will live a stable life (God willing). Seeing a woman I know in a dream about a married woman. A woman indicates the world in a man’s dream, or if she comes in a woman’s dream. Married woman, this is evidence of her husband: If the woman is...

A certain person he desires.Seeing a woman I know in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing a woman I know in a dream about a single womanIf the woman the girl sees is a friend she knows or loves, the evidence of the vision is that she will have a successful love experience and this friend will have a role in her marriage to the person she wants to communicate with However, if she sees a woman she does not love, this is evidence of the many problems she faces and may mean her failure in a romantic relationship and her exposure to a serious psychological crisis. If a girl sees a woman with dark skin in her dream, she may be subjected to distortion in her life by some people, and as a result her marriage will be delayed for a long time. A girl who sees a woman smiling at her and looking beautiful in appearance means that she will marry a man with prestige and power, with whom she will live a stable life (God willing). Seeing a woman I know in a dream about a married woman. A woman indicates the world in a man’s dream, or if she comes in a woman’s dream.
